channel.title: Where did the lounge go?
channel.description: So I remember when I was on a different discourse server and they had a lounge, also my regular badge says that I have acces to the lounge, what is this “lounge” and do we have one?

item.title: Where did the lounge go?
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
No it hasn’t.

I’m in the lounge right now. OMG. It’s awesome!!!

There’s golden iPhones in here, with Auxy 2019 installed.

Actually, check the description again. No mention of a lounge now!!

Read full topic

item.title: Where did the lounge go?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
The first rule of the lounge is you don’t talk about the lounge.

The second rule is… don’t talk about the lounge.

…

I’m just kidding, it’s been disabled.

Read full topic

item.title: Where did the lounge go?
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
The lounge is a Discourse feature that is enabled by default – it’s a category (like Branding & Distribution or Auxy Feedback) that is only accessible to regulars.

However, it looks like it has 1) been disabled, and 2) the Regular description has not been changed to reflect that.

Read full topic

item.title: Where did the lounge go?
item.dc:creator: Dj_Peloton
item.description:
So I remember when I was on a different discourse server and they had a lounge, also my regular badge says that I have acces to the lounge, what is this “lounge” and do we have one?
